title: Shopping Trolley

verbs: To use a trolley vehicle to go from one place to another.
To pull or draw something heavy.
To move onward heavily, laboriously, or slowly; to advance with weary effort; to go on lingeringly.
nouns: Recently bought goods.
Buying goods
The commodities purchased from storeswomen carrying home shopping didn't give me a second glance"
A retailer or shop is a business that presents a selection of goods or services and offers to sell them to customers for money or other goods.
Vehicle with two wheels
A cart is a vehicle designed for transport, using two wheels and normally pulled by one or a pair of draught animals.
A two-wheeled animal-pulled conveyance
Wheeled vehicle that can be pushed by a person; may have one or two or four wheels
A two-wheeled vehicle, commonly without springs, drawn by mules, oxen, or the like, used for the conveyance of heavy goods.
A small, open, wheeled vehicle, drawn or pushed by a person or animal, more often used for transporting goods than passengers.
Small pushable cart.
A small cart, normally with two or four wheels, that can be pushed by hand
A cart designed to be pulled or pushed by hand (as opposed to with a beast of burden.)

A list of items that a customer has selected to purchase from a commerce Web site. It is usually compiled into a file and sometimes visually represented by a shopping basket, shopping cart, or other container used when shopping.
A virtual container that stores products that have been selected for purchase from aÂ procurement catalog or a vendor catalog.
Wire basket fastened to a frame with wheels which customers use for collecting purchases in a store.
A cart or shopping cart.
A shopping cart.
A handcart that holds groceries or other goods while shopping
A cart supplied by a shop, for use by customers inside the shop for transport of merchandise
A shopping cart is a cart supplied by a shop, especially supermarkets, for use by customers inside the shop for transport of merchandise to the check-out counter during shopping.
A conveyance used to carry groceries and other items, while shopping in a store.
Conveyance used to carry items while shopping.

description: A metal shopping cart that you might find in a supermarket or grocery store.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the shopping cart emoji is depicted with a sleek, metallic design and a sturdy frame, complete with a handle and an open basket area. Apple's signature 3D shading and soft gradients give it a realistic, almost tangible feel, suggesting movement and utility. This emoji is universally understood to represent shopping, commerce, online purchasing, or the act of adding items to a list, making it a staple for expressing consumer activities and desires in digital conversations.
